name: リターン・オブ・ダブルドラゴン
summary: Super Double Dragon, based on the game known in Japan as Return of Double Dragon (リターン・オブ・双截龍ダブルドラゴン Ritān Obu Daburu Doragon), is a side-scrolling beat-'em-up released for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1992. It was published by Technōs Japan in Japan and by Tradewest in North America and the PAL region. Super Double Dragon is the fourth console game in the Double Dragon series developed by Technōs Japan, following Double Dragon III: The Sacred Stones for the NES. The game did not have an arcade release and was made specifically for the home market.
